choices.answer: Those diagnosed see and hear things that are only real to them
An uncommon condition where those diagnosed avoid social activity
A common disorder where those diagnosed cam empathize with friends

questions.question: What are some symptoms of Schizoid personality disorder?

choices.answer: Preference of being alone, no desire for sexual relationships
Pays attention to minute details, hard to work with
Have the entirety of their lives planned out

questions.question: What is obsessive compulsive personality disorder (OCPD)

choices.answer: Someone who is extremely messy and disorganized
Someone who shys away from others, and dislikes social interactions
Someone who obsesses over perfect orderliness insisting their way is right
Someone who obsesses over perfect orderliness, knowing they have a problem

questions.question: What are some symptoms of OCPD?

choices.answer: There are none. It is impossible to detect this disorder.
Obsession over perfectionism, situations and very stubborn.
Routinely checks for mistakes and pays attention to small details.

questions.question: True or false: A stereotype of OCPD is that OCD and OCPD are the same
OCPD is linked to violence and sexual related crimes.
Schizoid Personality Disorder is not linked to crimes
True or false: It was speculated Ted Bundy had Schizoid Personality Disorder.
What percent of those diagnosed with Schizoid, Schizotypal and Paranoid disorder go onto to commit crimes?
